lines.line: It's time.
Time for what?
Time to dig. To dig, dig, dig. But no normal dig. We now have new purpose!
What do you mean? What purpose?
The brothers six! Dutiful servants of Saradomin... At least, that's what they'd tell you! Ha! Not so. Not so.
They made a pact you see! Strength in life for servitude in death.
Servitude?
Yes! They guard it for him! That was their purpose, but that time is up now. He wants it back! You can get it! You can dig!
You want me to bring you something?
The icon! He needs it now! You must dig, dig, dig. Slay the brothers six! It's okay, it won't hurt them... much. The icon will be in the chest!
Right... So you want me to go and kill the six brothers and bring you back an icon?
Yes! Do this! Do this! Maybe little prize for you if you do. But first you must dig! Dig, dig, dig!
Okay...
Can you tell me more about the brothers?
The brothers? His faithful servants! Book tell you more! Take it! I don't even want it!
The brothers? His faithful servants! Book tell you more! Read it! Read it!
I wanted to ask you about warnings.
Yes?
Currently when I'm trying to go plundering the catacombs here, my mind is plagued by several inconvenient warnings about the dangers below.
I was wondering, do you know of a way to condense these warnings into a single one?
Thanks for having those mental warnings I was having condensed into a single one, but I miss having them seperated.
Is there any chance you'd be willing to change it back for me?
AAAAAAAAARRRRRRGGGGGHHHHHHHH!
I'm guessing that was a yes? In that case, thanks.
I'll be back soon.
Icon?
I don't have it yet.
Slow! No slow! Only fast! Fast dig! Dig, dig, dig!
Okay, I'll be back soon.
Yes, I have it here.
At last! Quick! Give it!
You did it! Now for me.
It's all little bits now.
What? But why? I thought you needed it!
Yes! Needed it for him, but not to keep! His friend asked him to protect it, but he made a new plan, a better plan!
What are you on about?
The old plan is gone. We're not doing it that way. His friend won't be happy, but it was for the best!
Now we're doing it his way...
Anyway, job well done! Still more digging though. Always dig. Dig, dig, dig!
Oh, and don't forget your prize! He made it very clear you had to have a prize!
Thanks... I guess.
Why did you destroy the icon? I though you needed it!
This is for you. Take it! Take it!
Thanks.
I'll leave you to it then...

characters.name: Strange Old Man
characters.description: Elderly male, British accent, frantic and rambling tone. A peculiar, unhinged hermit obsessed with digging, speaking in fragmented sentences with manic energy and cryptic references to dark powers.
